A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
dont listen to the disney pr- the low low audience score is correct to a tee!!    as a life long fan\, born into it\, grew up with the toys that were played\, mangled and destroyed\, and not kept in the box\, someone who appreciated where the prequels came from\, this film is a disgrace to the history and the lore of star wars- most scenes have a commercial aspect to it\, or an agenda..... abso- shocking!!!!!!    i went on the premiere day\, and it is the first star wars film i have no interest in watching anytime soon.i rate the prequels above this.

so do not give in to the disney cash cow\, in fact i feel like boycotting anything disney from this moment on.  ruined a legacy- ruined a franchise -  

awful awful awful
